dataaccesslayer

Interface TutorDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TutorDaoImpl

    public interface TutorDAO
    The TutorDAO interface defines the methods that must be implemented by any class that provides data access for tutors, This interface contains methods to retrieve information about all tutors, check a tutor's grade, check if a tutor is registered, and add a tutor to a tutor course table.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    TutorDAO

      Checks the grade of a tutor with the given last name and first name.
      java.lang.Integer checkRegister(java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String firstName)

      java.util.List<TutorDTO> getAllTutors()
      Retrieves a list of all tutors.

        java.util.List<TutorDTO> getAllTutors()
        Retrieves a list of all tutors.
        Returns:
        a list of all tutors

      • checkGrade

        java.lang.String checkGrade(java.lang.String lastName,
                            java.lang.String firstName)
        Checks the grade of a tutor with the given last name and first name.
        Parameters:
        lastName - the tutor's last name
        firstName - the tutor's first name
        Returns:
        a string representation of the tutor's grade

      • checkRegister

        java.lang.Integer checkRegister(java.lang.String lastName,
                                java.lang.String firstName)
        Checks if a tutor with the given last name and first name is registered.
        Parameters:
        lastName - the tutor's last name
        firstName - the tutor's first name
        Returns:
        the tutor's ID if they are registered, null otherwise

      • addTutorToTutorcourseTable

        void addTutorToTutorcourseTable(TutorDTO tutor,
                                java.lang.String courseCode)
        Adds a tutor to a tutor course table for the given course code.
        Parameters:
        tutor - the tutor to add to the table
        courseCode - the course code of the table to add the tutor to
